name: FARVEST
goal:
We organize many events and we have our own medias , ITOne, HROne, Marketers...
In all our medias or events we inform the decision makers with the last news related direclty to their business. In each media or events we have topics related to lateste EU laws ex: GDPR ( www.isdays.lu) , digital skills balance gender , circular economy, PSD2, ( www.ictspring.com )
In the majority of our events or media we diffuse information concerning the european laws or directives to inform our community of decision makers as CIO, CEO , RH managers etc...
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
